availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Newell on November 15, 1849. Father of William Nelson, Jennie E. Nelson, and Simon Nelson. Store keeper in Maysville in 1850. Merchant in Maysville in 1860 and 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, District 2, p. 106; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 81; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 5, p. 22; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mason County, Kentucky, October 1863, p. 111, (Accessed via ancestry.com); Elizabeth Prather Ellsberry,, comp., Marriage Records of Mason County, 1856-1860, Volume VI (Chillicothe, MO: Elizabeth Prather Ellsberry, c1965), Ancestry.
